title: Ping constantly rising
body: Since the new patch has come i can t play, my ping is constantly rising, i don t have other machines connected to my internet. Im playing on Mac, does anybody else has this problem?

replies.body: Your network may be having some connection issues, and having trouble maintaining communication with the game server.  If that happens, you could experience lag spikes and ultimately a disconnection.  Go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this resolved, but make sure to select Mac for instructions specific to your OS.  Hope that helps!
